item.title: Open letter to Dr. Peterson
item.description:
Dear Dr. Peterson,

I, just as yourself, want people to know the truth about the world we're living in. At this time, I aim for a very specific goal - to change a perspective of one man, Jordan Peterson, on the subject that I consider to be important - the events that took place in the USSR during 20th century and that are often referred to as "Stalin's repressions". I won't try to change your views on Marxism, socialism or communism. I will only provide you the objective picture about the actual figures and scale of these events.
